title: The electrical installations in the building including flats, shops, etc
clause_text: The electrical installations in the building including flats, shops, etc. shall be inspected periodically at least once in 5 year and the certificate to that effect shall be obtained from the Licensed Electrical Engineer. However, in case of any electrical repair / rectification / renovation work carried out in the building or part thereof, the certificate from Electrical Engineer shall be obtained after the completion of such work.
